item.title: Command-Line Cartography for a UK Election
item.description: Create a map of the UK constituencies ready for election night.

item.title: Tutorial: Mapping cycling times to BSN Vlaskamp
item.description: My experiment in using Google Distance Matrix API and Observable Notebooks to map out cycling times to BSN campus Vlaskamp.

item.title: Reviewing the FiveThirtyEight House Forecast 2018
item.description: Understanding the how the models faired in predicting voteshare in the 2018 mid-terms

item.title: Tutorial: JupyterLab Analytics on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: The $300 worth of credits seemed like a good reason to try out Google Cloud Platform for my prototype analytics stack. This is tutorial on how to set that up.

item.title: Open Data: Katine Style!
item.description: Whenever things seem to be getting too complicated I tried to think back to this example of open data from the Katine project in Uganda.
